name: E.V.I.L
description:
Brief Introduction

This is a tower defense game, it has five monsters and five defense towers. We have 3 preset levels and 3 custom levels in this game. You can use in-game level editor to build whatever you want in this game!

 Key Instruction
  • Common Key:
    • Q - Back to the last page;
  • In-game level editor Keys:
    • Space - open selection tab;
    • Enter - close selection tab;
    • Mouse button left on tower brush - create this tower;
    • Mouse button right on tower brush - unselect this tower brush;
    • Mouse button right on the tower - delete this tower;
  • Battle Keys:
    • Enter - open selection tab;
    • Escape - close selection tab;
    • Build command and unselect command are the same as level editor.
Game System

You need to cost money to build a tower;

If your core HP below or equal  to 0 you will lose;

When you kill all the monsters you will win the game!
